description:
P fails to chase after Mio when she runs out of the office. Then Rin leaves the project too, and it looks like the whole thing may fall apart. The other members hear about how P became cowardly in the way he interacts with idols after a past incident...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Wonder Where I Find the Light I Shine...
I Wonder Where I Find the Light I Shine...
I wonder where I find the light I shine...
